entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor css-isolation and js-isolation via rendertreebuilder #41450
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #41445
  • Add method to Results/TypedResults to allow creating a ContentHttpResult with a custom status code #41444
  • Cannot debug Blazor Wasm application on .Net 6: Unable to attach to browser #41443
  • How to properly write an implementation of the IClaimsTransformation interface in ASP.NET core 6 ? #41440
  • Blazor Hybrid is not as fast running Parallel code in Release mode #41439
  • Blazor WASM: Misleading error message when calling DotNetObjectReference.invokeMethod and then calling JSRuntime.InvokeAsync<T> #41438
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext_netty, plaintext_nodejs, plainTextEmptyFilter #41437
  • Profile and fix low hanging fruit in startup usage of minimal APIs #41436
  • Reduce usage of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #41435

Closed

  • Kestrel should throw BadHttpRequestException instead of InvalidOperationExceptions for absolute-form targets with non-ASCII characters #41071
    7.0-preview5
  • select component renders on first change with null value when inside CascadingValue=this and plain wrapper #41424
  • Blazor webassembly App: Cannot call unknown function mono_wasm_set_is_debugger_attached, make sure it is exported #41324
  • Blazor AOT compilation fails at ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.GroupExistingStaticWebAssets #37610
    6.0.x
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 Drag n Drop mobile devices #41394

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK and use 'u8' string literals #41449

Merged

  • Add query for how to look at helix work item perf to helix docs #41448
    7.0-preview5
  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Unquarantine behaving startup tests #41446
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Revert "Try out 1es images" #41441
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Fixed formatting #41434
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
